rows.label: qst502016_msg0001
rows.name: What can I help you with here?

rows.label: qst502016_msg0002
rows.name:
Well! You certainly look like
a fine, strong Blade!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0003
rows.name: I-I'd rather you didn't stare...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0004
rows.name: Sorry, sorry...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0005
rows.name:
It's your power of lightning
that I'm after.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh...I'm not sure if I can help you there.
I don't have very good control over my
energy, you see...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0007
rows.name: That's no problem at all.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0008
rows.name:
I just want you to help me test the
insulating armor I'm working on.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0009
rows.name:
No need to hold anything back.
Just give it a full-on blast, and
we'll see how well it holds up!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, if that's all, I guess I can
give it a shot!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0011
rows.name: Wait, I have to aim it at you?!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, yes. There's not much
point otherwise.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't worry, I'm quite confident
in this armor's insulating ability.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0014
rows.name: Give me everything you've got!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0015
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I should probably try to hold back
at least a little, though...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0016
rows.name: Here goes nothing!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0017
rows.name:
Hahaha!
Looks like there's still plenty of
work to be done on this armor!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0018
rows.name: Thank goodness you're alive...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0019
rows.name:
No need to feel down, my girl.
That's a wonderful power you have!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0020
rows.name:
One day, I swear I'll build an armor
that can block it out completely!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0021
rows.name:
I hope you'll help me test it out
again once that day comes.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0022
rows.name: O-Okay!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0023
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]If I really go all-out on him, though,
it'll probably be back to square one...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0024
rows.name:
Ahhhhh, no no no no!
I can't do this after all!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0025
rows.name:
I don't have the courage to aim
my attacks at an innocent person!
